function.en: This bale trailer can hold: 30 round bales, 24 square bales, 270 HP-bales, 26 1,4m Ultima, 26 1,5m Ultima, 12 pallets, 8 wood pallets, 16 big bales, 171 apple/chicken boxes, 150 milk/veg./rennet/bat., 57 butter/cheese/egg/trash, 116 geese/chicken feed. Max. wood log lenght: 11.5m
function.de: Dieser Ballenwagen fasst: 30 Rundballen, 24 Quaderballen, 270 HD-Ballen, 26 1,4m Ultima, 16 1,5m Ultima, 12 Paletten, 8 Holzpaletten, 16 BigBales, 171 Apfel-/Kükenkisten, 150 Milch/Gemüse/Lab/Batt., 57 Butter/Käse/Eier/Müll, 116 Hühner-/Gänsefutter. Max. Baumstamm Länge: 11,5m
